title: Number of pet birds in the U.S. 2000 to 2017
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of birds in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 9.
Overall Number of birds in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of birds in millions is roughly constant from 2000 to 2012, slightly increasing from 2012 to 2014, slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2015, and lastly slightly increasing from 2015 to 2017.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Number of birds in millions, of value 20.6 was reached at Year 2014, and 2017
The lowest Number of birds in millions, of value 14.3 was reported at Year 2015
